text: “Zvirokwazvo, murikunamata zvidhori kunze kwaAllah, uye murikuwedzeredza manyepo. Zvirokwazvo, izvo zvamunonamata kunze kwaAllah hazvina kana nemasimba ekukupai raramo yenyu. Naizvozvo tsvakayi raramo yenyu kubva kuna Allah chete, uye vanamatei vari voga, uye mova munovatenda. Kwavari ndiko kwamuchadzorerwa.”
